          <title>
            <string language="sl">Pirhi</string>
            <string language="en">Easter eggs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ostereier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Oeufs de pâques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ovos de easter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uova di Pasqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυγά Πάσχας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Huevos de Pascua</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kava obarva jajca z rjavo barvo.</string>
            <string language="en">In order to get brown easter eggs you could use coffee beans.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">pirh</string>
            <string language="en">easter egg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">velika noč</string>
            <string language="en">easter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">barvanje</string>
            <string language="en">coloring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kava</string>
            <string language="en">coffee</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwecks braunen Ostereiern Sie zu erhalten konnte 
Kaffeebohnen benutzen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Afin de vous obtenir aux oeufs de pâques bruns a 
pu utiliser des grains de café.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A fim começá-lo a ovos de easter marrons podia 
usar feijões de café.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per ottenerli ad uova di Pasqua marroni hanno 
potuto usare i chicchi di caffè.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκειμένου να αποκτηθούν τα καφετιά αυγά Πάσχας θα 
μπορούσατε να χρησιμοποιήσετε τα φασόλια καφέ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para conseguirle a huevos de Pascua marrones 
podía utilizar los granos de café.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Osterei</string>
